overview: Chaos is unleashed in several villages by an old demonic witch who rises from the dead.  In a creepy hut filled with kemenyan incense smoke, an old witch is performing a ritual with a skull on a pedestal. The skull then transforms into a talking head that laughs often! “Aku tidak mahu mati! (I don’t want to die)” she cackles, and the head grants her wish.
title: Hantu Jerangkong
